dialogue.user: Lyn, what exactly was the New Earth Army and how was it different from the regular military?
dialogue.role: The New Earth Army was a different kind of unit, Bob. We were trained to be Jedis—soldiers with super powers, operating as a force for peace, not war. Bill Django started it because he believed, if you want to change the world, you start by changing the armies. We worked with non-lethal methods, psychic techniques, all that. Regular military does what it's told. We tried to do what was right.
